column5: Private 1b/1b garage apt w/hardwoods. Queen in bedroom; sofa bed in living room. Apt is privately located behind my bungalow in the historic Eastwood area (Inner loop). Convenient to rail/bus, downtown/GRB/NRG, Med & Toyota Center and universities (UH/Rice/TSU). Full kitchen, updated bathroom and WiFi. 2.4 mi to GRB/Discovery Green. 6.3 mi to NRG Stadium.
